aboutDesc: Color Studio is a space where traditions of craftsmanship meet modern trends.
aboutFeature1Desc: We use only the best products and materials from world brands
aboutFeature2Desc: Our team is certified specialists with many years of experience
aboutFeature3Desc: Each client is unique, we create an image especially for you
aboutFeature4Desc: Cozy atmosphere and attentive attention to every detail
cookieConsentText: We use cookies to improve your website experience.

dataDeletion.description: If you want to delete your data from our system, please follow these steps:

step1.text: Send an email to our support team with the subject "Data Deletion Request".
step1.title: Send a request

step2.text: Our team will verify your identity to ensure the security of your data.
step2.title: Verification

step3.text: Once verified, we will permanently delete your account and all associated data within 30 days.
step3.title: Deletion

dataDeletion.title: Instruction for Data Deletion

faqContactPrompt: Didn't find the answer to your question?
galleryDesc: Modern interior creates an atmosphere of tranquility
noWorksFound: No works have been added to this category yet
portfolioDesc: Be inspired by the results of our masters
privacySection1Text1: M Le Diamant (“We”, “Our”, “Salon”) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.
privacySection1Text2: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.
privacySection2List1: Personal information: name, email address, phone number
privacySection2List2: Booking information: date and time of visit, selected services
privacySection2List3: Usage data: information about how you interact with our site
privacySection2List4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system
privacySection2List5: Medical information: allergies, contraindications (only with your consent)
privacySection2Text: We may collect the following types of information:
privacySection3List3: Contacting you about your visits and services
privacySection3List4: Improving the quality of our services
privacySection3List5: Sending marketing messages (only with your consent)
privacySection3Text: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
privacySection4Text: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.
privacySection5Text: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties, except as necessary to provide our services (for example, to payment partners) or as required by UAE law.
privacySection5Title: Transfer of data to third parties
privacySection6List2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
privacySection6List3: Right to erasure of your data
privacySection6Text: You have the following rights in relation to your personal data:
privacySection7Text: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience.
privacySection8Text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time.
subscribeDesc: Be the first to know about special offers
teamDesc: Professionals with many years of experience
termsSection1Text: Welcome to the M Le Diamant website.
termsSection2Text: M Le Diamant provides premium beauty salon services including but not limited to:
termsSection3Text1: You can book services through our website, over the phone or in person at the salon.
termsSection3Text2: Some services may require a deposit at time of booking.
termsSection3Text3: Payment is made after services are provided.
termsSection3Text4: All prices are in UAE Dirhams (AED).
termsSection4Text1: You can cancel or change your reservation up to 24 hours before your scheduled time without penalty.
termsSection4Text2: If canceled less than 24 hours in advance or no-show, the deposit (if paid) will not be refunded.
termsSection4Text3: If you are more than 15 minutes late, we reserve the right to cancel the reservation or reduce the procedure time.
termsSection5List1: Follow the rules of the salon and communicate politely with staff
termsSection5List2: Provide accurate health and allergy information
termsSection6Text2: It is the client's responsibility to provide information about any allergies.
termsSection6Text3: The results of the procedures may vary depending on individual characteristics.
termsSection6Text4: We are not responsible for loss or damage to customer personal items.
termsSection7Text1: Gift certificates are valid for 12 months from the date of purchase.
termsSection7Text2: Gift certificates cannot be returned or exchanged for cash.
termsSection7Text3: Gift certificates can be transferred to another person.
termsSection8Text: All materials on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images and software, are the property of M Le Diamant and are protected by UAE copyright and trademark laws.
termsSection9Text: M Le Diamant reserves the right to change these Terms of Use at any time.
testimonialsDesc: We are proud of the trust of our clients
